Description: The right-click function for software on the Start screen does not respond, newly installed programs cannot be pinned to the Start screen, and the right-click function for programs freezes. Has anyone else encountered the same issue?
Title: After updating to Windows 11.24H2, the screen started having problems.
EnhancedContent: The right-click function for software on the Start screen does not respond, newly installed programs cannot be pinned to the Start screen, and the right-click function for programs freezes. Has anyone else encountered the same issue?
Author: Mikaeliop
